process.file

Class AutomatonFileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • process.file.AutomatonFileHelper

  • public class AutomatonFileHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used in order to save an automaton in file or load one.
    Author:
    Aldric Vitali Silvestre

    • Method Detail

      • saveAutomaton

        public void saveAutomaton(Automaton automaton,
                          java.lang.String filePath)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Save the currently stored automaton in a custom file (with extension .crea). This method does not overwrite any file, instead, the name of the save file will be slightly changed.

        ex : if "file.crea" already exists, it will be replaced by "file(1).crea"

        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of the file where automaton will be saved. The name can change if one already exists. Moreover, the file will have the extension ".crea" no matter what
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any IO error occurs (such as security error)

      • loadAutomaton

        public Automaton loadAutomaton(java.lang.String filename)
                        throws FileFormatException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Throws:
        FileFormatException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
